title: WordPress For Beginners - No Coding Required
description:
Description

This WordPress course is for beginners who are not familiar with the WordPress content management system. It takes you step by step with easy and simple to understand lectures from not having a clue about WordPress to creating your first functional website within minutes.

What’s different about this course?

It doesn’t contain complex information that is difficult to understand by the average Joe, unlike other courses that do that. All of the lectures in this course are based on WordPress principles simplified enough to understand them.To take this course you don’t need to be a genius or a computer expert. You only need to know how to use a computer and have passion about learning.

About the course.

    This course explains how to install WordPress locally.
    It also provides free WordPress web hosting.
    Explains almost every aspect of the WordPress CMS.
    You will be able to create your first website within minutes.
    WordPress is the most used CMS on the internet and powers 30% of all websites.
    You will only need to set up WordPress, which we explain how in the first section of this course.

Who is the target audience?

    The ideal student is anyone who doesn’t have knowledge about building websites with WordPress.
    Everyone who wants to build professional looking websites.

Requirements

    You need to know how to use a computer.
    You need to have access on the internet.
    You need a browser to access the internet.
    You don’t need any programming experience

parsed.name: WordPress For Beginners - No Coding Required
